data.name: SentinelAuditExporter_ExportBatchChunkError
data.value: Error exporting batch chunk to Azure Sentinel

data.name: SentinelAuditExporter_ExportBatchSummary
data.value: Exported batch of {TotalCount} audit events to Azure Sentinel. Success: {SuccessCount}, Failed: {FailedCount}

data.name: SentinelAuditExporter_ExportedAuditEvent
data.value: Exported audit event {EventId} to Azure Sentinel

data.name: SentinelAuditExporter_ExportFailedStatus
data.value: Failed to export audit event {EventId} to Azure Sentinel. Status: {StatusCode}, Response: {Response}

data.name: SentinelAuditExporter_HttpErrorExportingEvent
data.value: HTTP error exporting audit event {EventId} to Azure Sentinel

data.name: SentinelAuditExporter_RetryingExport
data.value: Retrying Azure Sentinel export (attempt {Attempt}) after {Delay}ms due to {StatusCode}

data.name: SentinelAuditExporter_TimeoutExportingEvent
data.value: Timeout exporting audit event {EventId} to Azure Sentinel
